title: Can You Secretly Record Conversations with Your Spouse?
description: What this means is that you may secretly record a conversation you have with your spouse if it occurs in person. Since you are a party to the conversation, your consent is sufficient. However, it is illegal to secretly record the same conversation with your spouse if it occurs over the telephone.
